alert.note: Alert for Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:14AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton and southwestern Boone Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 414 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Capps, or 5 miles southwest of Harrison, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Jasper... Western Grove... Valley Springs... Piercetown... Carver... Erbie... Pruitt... Bellefonte... Pindall... Marble Falls... Yardelle... Gum Springs in Newton County... Gaither... Hasty... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations
